attributes.action: open a debate on the issue of reforming both Houses of Parliament with an aim to remove all parties and partisan activity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a so-called modern democracy we have the right to expect MPs to act in the best interests of their constituents and the country they are elected to serve.  The curent situation is unsustainable and leads to a deadlock of the political process. As most MPs seem to put their wages and their party first we should remove all partisan activity and have every member stand as an independent and then run for cabinet posts.
